element.description: A new kid must find a guy to date the meanest girl in school, the older sister of the girl he has a crush on, who cannot date until her older sister does.
element.title: 10 Things I Hate About You

element.description: In the antebellum United States, Solomon Northup, a free black man from upstate New York, is abducted and sold into slavery.
element.title: 12 Years a Slave

element.description: A DEA agent and a naval intelligence officer find themselves on the run after a botched attempt to infiltrate a drug cartel. While fleeing, they learn the secret of their shaky alliance: Neither knew that the other was an undercover agent.
element.title: 2 Guns

element.description: Humanity finds a mysterious, obviously artificial, object buried beneath the Lunar surface and, with the intelligent computer H.A.L. 9000, sets off on a quest.
element.title: 2001: A Space Odyssey

element.description: A pair of underachieving cops are sent back to a local high school to blend in and bring down a synthetic drug ring.
element.title: 21 Jump Street

element.description: After making their way through high school (twice), big changes are in store for officers Schmidt and Jenko when they go deep undercover at a local college.
element.title: 22 Jump Street

element.description: Four weeks after a mysterious, incurable virus spreads throughout the UK, a handful of survivors try to find sanctuary.
element.title: 28 Days Later...

element.description: A dying CIA agent trying to reconnect with his estranged daughter is offered an experimental drug that could save his life in exchange for one last assignment.
element.title: 3 Days to Kill

element.description: King Leonidas and a force of 300 men fight the Persians at Thermopylae in 480 B.C.
Greek general Themistokles leads the charge against invading Persian forces led by mortal-turned-god Xerxes and Artemisia, vengeful commander of the Persian navy.
element.title: 300: Rise of an Empire

element.description: A band of samurai set out to avenge the death and dishonor of their master at the hands of a ruthless shogun.
element.title: 47 Ronin

element.description: In future Britain, charismatic delinquent Alex DeLarge is jailed and volunteers for an experimental aversion therapy developed by the government in an effort to solve society's crime problem - but not all goes according to plan.
element.title: A Clockwork Orange

element.description: In the Iranian ghost-town Bad City, a place that reeks of death and loneliness, the townspeople are...
element.title: A Girl Walks Home Alone at Night

element.description: As a cowardly farmer begins to fall for the mysterious new woman in town, he must put his new-found courage to the test when her husband, a notorious gun-slinger, announces his arrival.
element.title: A Million Ways to Die in the West

element.description: In the dreams of his victims, a spectral child murderer stalks the children of the members of the lynch mob that killed him.
element.title: A Nightmare on Elm Street

element.description: A re-imagining of the horror icon Freddy Krueger, a serial-killer who wields a glove with four blades embedded in the fingers and kills people in their dreams, resulting in their real death in reality.
element.title: A Nightmare on Elm Street

element.description: Private investigator Matthew Scudder is hired by a drug kingpin to find out who kidnapped and murdered his wife.
element.title: A Walk Among the Tombstones

element.description: At the age of 21, Tim discovers he can travel in time and change what happens and has happened in his own life. His decision to make his world a better place by getting a girlfriend turns out not to be as easy as you might think.
element.title: About Time

element.description: Abraham Lincoln, the 16th President of the United States, discovers vampires are planning to take over the United States. He makes it his mission to eliminate them.
element.title: Abraham Lincoln: Vampire Hunter

element.description: A gallerist risks her family and flourishing career when she enters into an affair with a talented painter and slowly loses control of her life.
element.title: Addicted

element.description: Alexander, the King of Macedonia and one of the greatest military leaders in the history of warfare, conquers much of the known world.
element.title: Alexander

element.description: Alexander's day begins with gum stuck in his hair, followed by more calamities. Though he finds little sympathy from his family and begins to wonder if bad things only happen to him, his mom, dad, brother, and sister all find themselves living through their own terrible, horrible, no good, very bad day.
element.title: Alexander and the Terrible, Horrible, No Good, Very Bad Day

element.description: The commercial vessel Nostromo receives a distress call from an unexplored planet. After searching for survivors, the crew heads home only to realize that a deadly bioform has joined them.
element.title: Alien

element.description: Ripley continues to be stalked by a savage alien, after her escape pod crashes on a prison planet.
element.title: Alien 3

element.description: 200 years after her death, Ellen Ripley is revived as a powerful human/Alien hybrid clone who must continue her war against the Aliens.
element.title: Alien: Resurrection

element.description: The planet from Alien has been colonized, but contact is lost. This time, the rescue team has impressive firepower, but will it be enough?
element.title: Aliens

element.description: Reporters Woodward and Bernstein uncover the details of the Watergate scandal that leads to President Nixon's resignation.
element.title: All the President's Men

element.description: A sexually frustrated suburban father has a mid-life crisis after becoming infatuated with his daughter's best friend.
element.title: American Beauty

element.description: A former neo-nazi skinhead tries to prevent his younger brother from going down the same wrong path that he did.
element.title: American History X

element.description: A con man, Irving Rosenfeld, along with his seductive partner Sydney Prosser, is forced to work for a wild FBI agent, Richie DiMaso, who pushes them into a world of Jersey powerbrokers and mafia.
element.title: American Hustle
